{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":2984059,"name":"Bryn Dole - programming mentor FRC 2930","username":"randomstring","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/randomstring/{size}/170695_2.png","created_at":"2021-12-29T23:14:14.709Z","cooked":"

Is there any chance someone can share a link to the new RoboRIO 2.0 images? ie the 2022 season FRC Tools. I’m using the winter break to experiment with swerve and test out the WPILib beta. I prefer to understand stuff before I try to teach it. Unfortunately I didn’t have the foresight to join the beta program this year and now it is closed. That seems to be the only way to access the 2022 FRC Tools prior to the official season launch.

I cannot deploy WPILib beta code without the new RoboRIO image, and the only links I can find for the NI FRC Tools are from 2021.

Anyone with early access to a RoboRIO 2.0 is in the same boat. There are a number of teams who have posted to the NI forums asking for the new RoboRIO image.

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":18,"updated_at":"2021-12-29T23:14:14.709Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":61,"reads":312,"readers_count":311,"score":372.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":398503,"topic_slug":"request-for-early-access-to-2022-ni-frc-tools","display_username":"Bryn Dole - programming mentor FRC 2930","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":33397,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/request-for-early-access-to-2022-ni-frc-tools/398503/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":2984062,"name":"Nelson Green (1108 Mentor Coach Electrical Programming)","username":"ngreen","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/ngreen/{size}/264478_2.png","created_at":"2021-12-29T23:24:39.146Z","cooked":"

Unfortunately, I don’t think we are allowed to share the images outside the beta. I was going to suggest contacting NI about it, particularly with the RIIO, but it sounds like you’ve looked some there.

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":18,"updated_at":"2021-12-29T23:24:39.146Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":302,"readers_count":301,"score":70.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":398503,"topic_slug":"request-for-early-access-to-2022-ni-frc-tools","display_username":"Nelson Green (1108 Mentor Coach Electrical Programming)","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":2695,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/request-for-early-access-to-2022-ni-frc-tools/398503/2","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2984074,"name":"Bryn Dole - programming mentor FRC 2930","username":"randomstring","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/randomstring/{size}/170695_2.png","created_at":"2021-12-29T23:51:17.137Z","cooked":"
ngreen:

I don’t think we are allowed to share the images outside the beta.

I don’t see what possible harm can come of it. The WPILib code is open and the beta is available to all. The RoboRIO 2.0 spec is available and real live RoboRIO 2.0s are in the hands of consumers. We are days away from the official SW release. What’s the harm of having a few over-eager teams download and install the latest beta for FRC Tools?

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":18,"updated_at":"2021-12-29T23:51:17.137Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":2,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":286,"readers_count":285,"score":67.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":398503,"topic_slug":"request-for-early-access-to-2022-ni-frc-tools","display_username":"Bryn Dole - programming mentor FRC 2930","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":33397,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/request-for-early-access-to-2022-ni-frc-tools/398503/3","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2984075,"name":"marshall","username":"marshall","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/marshall/{size}/167657_2.png","created_at":"2021-12-29T23:52:31.700Z","cooked":"
randomstring:

Anyone with early access to a RoboRIO 2.0 is in the same boat. There are a number of teams who have posted to the NI forums asking for the new RoboRIO image.

Strange that they aren’t getting support from the NI folks over there.

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":18,"updated_at":"2021-12-29T23:52:31.700Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":272,"readers_count":271,"score":69.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":398503,"topic_slug":"request-for-early-access-to-2022-ni-frc-tools","display_username":"marshall","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":17672,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Team Principal"},"post_url":"/t/request-for-early-access-to-2022-ni-frc-tools/398503/4","custom_user_title":"Team Principal","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2984078,"name":"Bryn Dole - programming mentor FRC 2930","username":"randomstring","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/randomstring/{size}/170695_2.png","created_at":"2021-12-29T23:55:00.719Z","cooked":"
marshall:

Strange that they aren’t getting support from the NI folks over there.

One of several posts on the NI forums. No help other than “join the beta.”

forums.ni.com – 16 Oct 21

RoboRIO 2.0 not imaging

We have recently acquired multiple RoboRio 2s and are attempting to image them so we may test them on our test robots.     Yet whenever we attempt to image these RIOs using RoboRio 1 software we seem to have no success. The main issue...

","post_number":5,"post_type":1,"posts_count":18,"updated_at":"2021-12-29T23:55:00.719Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":266,"readers_count":265,"score":88.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":398503,"topic_slug":"request-for-early-access-to-2022-ni-frc-tools","display_username":"Bryn Dole - programming mentor FRC 2930","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://forums.ni.com/t5/Discovering-and-Imaging-the/RoboRIO-2-0-not-imaging/td-p/4185681","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"RoboRIO 2.0 not imaging - NI Community","clicks":11}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":33397,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/request-for-early-access-to-2022-ni-frc-tools/398503/5","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2984084,"name":"marshall","username":"marshall","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/marshall/{size}/167657_2.png","created_at":"2021-12-30T00:06:16.044Z","cooked":"

That’s unfortunate. The beta rules do officially prohibit teams from sharing the images unfortunately. It’s rather frustrating.

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":18,"updated_at":"2021-12-30T00:06:16.044Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":5,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":245,"readers_count":244,"score":69.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":398503,"topic_slug":"request-for-early-access-to-2022-ni-frc-tools","display_username":"marshall","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":33397,"username":"randomstring","name":"Bryn Dole - programming mentor FRC 2930","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/randomstring/{size}/170695_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":17672,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Team Principal"},"post_url":"/t/request-for-early-access-to-2022-ni-frc-tools/398503/7","custom_user_title":"Team Principal","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2984085,"name":"Peter Johnson","username":"Peter_Johnson","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/peter_johnson/{size}/10417_2.png","created_at":"2021-12-30T00:23:32.371Z","cooked":"
randomstring:

We are days away from the official SW release. What’s the harm of having a few over-eager teams download and install the latest beta for FRC Tools?

One reason is because CSAs will see those beta installs at competitions (it’s happened before). That’s made much more likely if the beta is made widely available shortly before the official release. There may also be late breaking changes that aren’t in the last beta but will be in the final release. There can also be wonky things that can happen going from the beta install to the kickoff install, and minimizing how many teams might be bit by such things also reduces the support burden. At this point the NI and WPILib teams are largely focused on making sure the kickoff release is solid.

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":18,"updated_at":"2021-12-30T00:23:46.839Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":3,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":231,"readers_count":230,"score":116.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":398503,"topic_slug":"request-for-early-access-to-2022-ni-frc-tools","display_username":"Peter Johnson","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":6}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":13575,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Volunteer WPILib Developer, CSA"},"post_url":"/t/request-for-early-access-to-2022-ni-frc-tools/398503/8","custom_user_title":"Volunteer WPILib Developer, CSA","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":4},{"id":"100","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":6,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2984088,"name":"Bryn Dole - programming mentor FRC 2930","username":"randomstring","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/randomstring/{size}/170695_2.png","created_at":"2021-12-30T00:44:39.421Z","cooked":"

I didn’t join the beta this year because I didn’t expect to have the time to install and test the beta properly. Lesson learned. Don’t try to test WPILib beta without joining the beta program first.

Time to re-install 2021 SW and wait for the 2022 season SW release.

Godspeed WPILib maintainers, may all your issues be marked “resolved.”

","post_number":9,"post_type":1,"posts_count":18,"updated_at":"2021-12-30T00:44:39.421Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":8,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":216,"readers_count":215,"score":78.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":398503,"topic_slug":"request-for-early-access-to-2022-ni-frc-tools","display_username":"Bryn Dole - programming mentor FRC 2930","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":13575,"username":"Peter_Johnson","name":"Peter Johnson","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/peter_johnson/{size}/10417_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":33397,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/request-for-early-access-to-2022-ni-frc-tools/398503/9","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2984130,"name":"FrankJ","username":"FrankJ","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/frankj/{size}/5392_2.png","created_at":"2021-12-30T13:58:36.845Z","cooked":"

NI is constrained by First rules. Since the First rule regardless of its value is no image until kick off NI is not the one that can change that. I vaguely recall the same issue when the update Crio came out and the 1st gen Rio. They were useless boxes until kick off for the unwashed.

","post_number":10,"post_type":1,"posts_count":18,"updated_at":"2021-12-30T13:58:36.845Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":4,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":164,"readers_count":163,"score":77.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":398503,"topic_slug":"request-for-early-access-to-2022-ni-frc-tools","display_username":"FrankJ","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":17672,"username":"marshall","name":"marshall","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/marshall/{size}/167657_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":15944,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"2974 Robot Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/request-for-early-access-to-2022-ni-frc-tools/398503/10","custom_user_title":"2974 Robot Mentor","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2984160,"name":"marshall","username":"marshall","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/marshall/{size}/167657_2.png","created_at":"2021-12-30T17:15:08.854Z","cooked":"

For giving out the image? I guess so but for providing friendly forum responses to teams in need? Not sure that’s a hurdle that HQ has constructed for them. Seems like, from that thread linked, teams just want some help using this new system - including one of the beta teams.

Now, I’m not sure what they are struggling with. I’ve been enjoying Doom for weeks now.

","post_number":11,"post_type":1,"posts_count":18,"updated_at":"2021-12-30T17:15:08.854Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":10,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":148,"readers_count":147,"score":74.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":398503,"topic_slug":"request-for-early-access-to-2022-ni-frc-tools","display_username":"marshall","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":15944,"username":"FrankJ","name":"FrankJ","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/frankj/{size}/5392_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":3}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":17672,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Team Principal"},"post_url":"/t/request-for-early-access-to-2022-ni-frc-tools/398503/11","custom_user_title":"Team Principal","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":3}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":3,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2984167,"name":"AllenGregoryIV","username":"AllenGregoryIV","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/allengregoryiv/{size}/65531_2.png","created_at":"2021-12-30T17:36:58.671Z","cooked":"
FrankJ:

Since the First rule regardless of its value is no image until kick off NI is not the one that can change that.

I don’t believe this is the FIRST rule, unless it’s new. The 2020 NI Game Tools download was publicly released 12/19/2019 ,well before kickoff.

","post_number":12,"post_type":1,"posts_count":18,"updated_at":"2021-12-30T17:36:58.671Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":10,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":138,"readers_count":137,"score":47.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":398503,"topic_slug":"request-for-early-access-to-2022-ni-frc-tools","display_username":"AllenGregoryIV","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":true,"admin":false,"staff":true,"user_id":10647,"hidden":false,"trust_level":4,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Engineering Coach - Spectrum 3847/Photon 8515"},"post_url":"/t/request-for-early-access-to-2022-ni-frc-tools/398503/12","custom_user_title":"Engineering Coach - Spectrum 3847/Photon 8515","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2984191,"name":"FrankJ","username":"FrankJ","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/frankj/{size}/5392_2.png","created_at":"2021-12-30T18:31:35.801Z","cooked":"

A rule is maybe not the best word, but it is close. But I don’t recall the rio images/configurations ever being available before kickoff except for Beta teams . My recollection is the encrypted files could be download before kickoff. Much like the game manuals. Being somewhat senile, I can be wrong. Actually I was often wrong before I became senile.

The 2020 images and game tools were released unencrypted that early. I am unsure why only that year I hoped it would be a trend moving forward but apparently not.

The release date depends on a number of factors, including whether or not the game affects the image. In the “old days” the NI installer included vision examples, which is why it was encrypted and released only at kickoff (in the really old days, the WPILib installer was also encrypted). In recent years, the vision examples have been released separately by FIRST so this is no longer a constraint. However, in 2019, the image included a change for the Sandstorm period unique to that year. I would say we’re moving in the direction of pre-kickoff unencrypted releases, but it still depends on whether or not the software itself is ready to go or we’re still working on fixing late-breaking bugs. The kickoff release is by far the most widely disseminated one (teams often do not update unless it’s required by the rules) so there’s always a slant towards getting it as solid as possible vs. releasing it earlier.
